title: Jinxed
description: Jordan "Jinx" Monroe wanted it all - to have love and win a major title on the professional womenâ€™s bowling tour. Just when she thought she could have it all, she loses a major bowling tournament to her main rival Renita Hamilton and her fiance leaves her at the altar for one of her bridesmaids. Jinx needs to find her way back. On the lanes and in love. Is Jinx jinxed?
author: Michelle Carey
